topic.title: CIS 241 Week 4 2017 Fall
topic.text:
Hello CIS 241 class :

This is CIS 241 Week 4 Lesson 3 Cascading Style Sheets (CSS) and Graphical Elements. 

The assignments for this week:

Activities
          Activity 3-1: Identifying HTML and CSS terms  
Labs
          Lesson 3 Labs
Discussions
          Discussion -- Lesson 3 Cascading Style Sheets (CSS) and Graphical Elements   
Quizzes
          Review Quiz : Lesson 3 Cascading Style Sheets (CSS) and Graphical Elements         

You also should continue working on Competency Demonstration - CIS 241 Web Dev I Final Project due on Dec 6, 2017, 

Be sure to come in to see me if you have any problems or questions.

10/9/2017


Instructor/Advisor: Louis HO
Computer Information Systems
Office: Alderwood Hall 235A
Tel: 425 640 1308
Email: louis.ho@email.edcc.edu
Edmonds Community College
